summary: This release brings exciting new tools to shape your blog's experience, introducing the Terrarium visual scene composer and a unified login interface. We've also added the Waystone contextual help system and refined animations for a smoother, more polished feel. Under the hood, important fixes improve reliability behind proxies and across the platform, all part of our ongoing effort to make Grove more intuitive and powerful for you.

features: add LoginGraft for unified auth UI (#728)
add semantic element support to GlassCard
add 15-minute cooldown for vine parting animation (#722)
add zoom, resize, rotation, flip, and background controls
add documentation word frequency insights to Journey page
add drag-to-canvas and fix palette components
fixes: update test for dynamic secure flag
